data.lyric:
[ti:Blame It On Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:beerbongs & bentleys (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Blame It On Me - Post Malone
[00:03.21]Producer：Louis Bell/Post Malone
[00:06.43]I used to say I was free
[00:09.78]
[00:12.30]Now all these people wanna keep on taking pieces of me
[00:17.67]
[00:19.26]They take away everything had everything that I needed
[00:25.66]
[00:27.13]They held me down let me drown
[00:29.62]They spit me out right through the teeth
[00:33.48]
[00:34.94]I can't pretend ash in the wind won't blow again
[00:38.52]It was a breeze for you
[00:41.59]
[00:42.92]These hurricanes inside of my brain let it rain
[00:46.32]Made it look easy
[00:49.13]
[00:50.65]Can't look away you love the pain you love the pain
[00:54.32]Watchin' me bleed
[00:57.48]You cut me down on my knees
[01:01.26]No matter what you believe
[01:05.30]I think we both can agree
[01:09.23]That you can't blame it on me yeah
[01:13.74]
[01:14.24]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[01:17.82]Blame it on me
[01:20.49]
[01:22.12]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[01:25.69]I couldn't breathe
[01:28.61]Almost lost myself couldn't stop myself I did it all
[01:33.21]You can't blame it on me
[01:36.22]
[01:37.86]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[01:41.36]
[01:42.14]Everyday's the same yeah I just watch 'em go
[01:45.98]As I scrape away through the impossible
[01:49.95]Yeah I played the game but it was all for show
[01:53.78]Tryna find my way I nearly lost it though
[01:57.27]
[01:57.95]Now I see dead people most have no faith
[02:02.02]Where did the time go A watch with no face
[02:05.83]They hit the ceiling but my roof likes space
[02:09.85]I took my chances so won't you
[02:13.02]Blame it on me
[02:16.10]
[02:17.19]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[02:20.84]Blame it on me ayy
[02:25.09]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[02:28.73]I couldn't breathe
[02:31.56]Almost lost myself couldn't stop myself I did it all
[02:36.18]You can't blame it on me
[02:39.34]
[02:40.82]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault not my fault
[02:45.34]
[02:46.11]It's all my fault that I'm addicted to the clothes
[02:49.92]It's all my fault I paid the cost yeah
[02:53.15]
[02:53.71]It's all my fault that I ain't givin' up my soul
[02:57.77]It's all my fault
[02:59.16]
[03:00.22]Watchin' me bleed
[03:03.44]You cut me down on my knees
[03:07.14]No matter what you believe
[03:11.08]I think we both can agree
[03:15.06]That you can't blame it on me
[03:19.25]
[03:20.12]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[03:23.75]Blame it on me
[03:26.63]
[03:28.00]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[03:31.49]I couldn't breathe
[03:34.37]Almost lost myself couldn't stop myself I did it all
[03:39.03]You can't blame it on me ayy
[03:43.74]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[03:47.40]
[03:51.75]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
[03:55.40]Blame it on me yeah
[03:59.02]
[03:59.61]It's not my fault it's not my fault it's not my fault
data.trans:
[ti:Blame It On Me (Explicit)]
[ar:Post Malone]
[al:beerbongs & bentleys (Explicit)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:03.21]//
[00:06.43]我常说我是自由的
[00:09.78]
[00:12.30]现在 所有人都想拿走我的东西
[00:17.67]
[00:19.26]他们拿走了我所需要的一切 
[00:25.66]
[00:27.13]他们将我击倒 试图让我一败涂地
[00:29.62]他们对我嗤之以鼻
[00:33.48]
[00:34.94]我无法假装风平浪静
[00:38.52]对你来说 这只是一缕清风
[00:41.59]
[00:42.92]但我脑海中 早已是狂风暴雨
[00:46.32]我假装自己过得很好
[00:49.13]
[00:50.65]我无法将目光从你身上移开 你喜欢看我痛苦的模样
[00:54.32]看着我遍体鳞伤
[00:57.48]你使我双膝跪地 伤痕累累
[01:01.26]无论你的信仰是什么
[01:05.30]我想我们都同意这点
[01:09.23]你不能归咎于我 
[01:13.74]
[01:14.24]这不是我的错
[01:17.82]归咎于我
[01:20.49]
[01:22.12]这不是我的错
[01:25.69]我几欲窒息
[01:28.61]我已迷失 我情难自控 我已全力以赴
[01:33.21]你不能归咎于我
[01:36.22]
[01:37.86]这不是我的错
[01:41.36]
[01:42.14]每天都一成不变 我就这样静待时光流逝
[01:45.98]我想要除去所有的不可能
[01:49.95]是的 我参与这场游戏 但一切都是逢场作戏
[01:53.78]我试图找到我的路 我几乎已失去自我
[01:57.27]
[01:57.95]现在我明白 大多心死之人已没有信心
[02:02.02]时间都去哪儿了 手表也不知道
[02:05.83]他们撞到了天花板 但我的屋顶如苍穹般广阔
[02:09.85]我会把握机会 你会吗
[02:13.02]归咎于我
[02:16.10]
[02:17.19]这不是我的错
[02:20.84]归咎于我 
[02:25.09]这不是我的错
[02:28.73]我几欲窒息
[02:31.56]我已迷失 我情难自控 我已全力以赴
[02:36.18]你不能归咎于我
[02:39.34]
[02:40.82]这不是我的错
[02:45.34]
[02:46.11]对服装上瘾 这都是我的错
[02:49.92]我已付出代价 这都是我的错
[02:53.15]
[02:53.71]我不该自我放逐 这都是我的错
[02:57.77]这都是我的错
[02:59.16]
[03:00.22]看着我遍体鳞伤
[03:03.44]你使我双膝跪地 伤痕累累
[03:07.14]不管你的信仰是什么
[03:11.08]我想我们都同意这点
[03:15.06]你不能归咎于我
[03:19.25]
[03:20.12]这不是我的错
[03:23.75]归咎于我
[03:26.63]
[03:28.00]这不是我的错
[03:31.49]我几欲窒息
[03:34.37]我已迷失 我情难自控 我已全力以赴
[03:39.03]你不能归咎于我
[03:43.74]这不是我的错
[03:47.40]
[03:51.75]这不是我的错
[03:55.40]归咎于我
[03:59.02]
[03:59.61]这不是我的错
